title: New: Wolf Alice – Moaning Lisa Smile
body:
Only a month or so on from Alex Turner’s controversial rock ‘n’ roll ‘will never die’ Brits awards speech, and **Wolf Alice** are living up to the words of the Arctic Monkey’s frontman.

Having already proved themselves to be one of Britain’s most exciting new bands, they were one of the most talked about acts of last month’s SXSW Festival and are sure to be a big hit at UK festivals over the summer. New track, _Moaning Lisa Smile_ is a key part of their current live show, and encapsulate the raw energy and charismatic strut that has become so integral to their success.
